Articles.Content:
Hi,

One more quick question: Where is this career mode everyones talking about? Am I correct that they've implemented it now? I thought I read that in a few posts trying to look into it, but I don't know if I just need to update or I'm running an older copy or what but I dont see a career mode on my launch screen...

Yeah, you most likely have an older version. 0.22 is the newest, and has career mode. When you start a new game switch to career instead of sandbox.

And hope you enjoy the forums!

Indo, if you don't see this,

you probably have an old version of the game. It's easy enough to check, though; see the version number in the lower right?
